    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character​(java.lang.String characterName,
                 float xPosition,
                 float yPosition,
                 org.jsfml.graphics.Texture characterTexture,
                 int expectedNumberOfItems)
        1/2 constructors - this one has the addition of expectedNumber of items.
        Parameters:
        characterName - sets the name of this character.
        xPosition - sets the X position of this character.
        yPosition - sets the Y position of this character.
        characterTexture - sets the texture of this character.
        expectedNumberOfItems - sets the number of items associated with this character - NPC only.

      • Character

        public Character​(java.lang.String characterName,
                 float xPosition,
                 float yPosition,
                 org.jsfml.graphics.Texture characterTexture,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Item> items)
        2/2 constructors - this one has the addition of all items within the game.
        Parameters:
        characterName - sets the name of this character.
        xPosition - sets the X position of this character.
        yPosition - sets the Y position of this character.
        characterTexture - sets the texture of this character.
        items - sets all items in the game.
